info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:23PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rio Blanco County through 300 PM MDT... At 223 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles east of Rangely, or 56 miles southwest of Craig, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Rio Blanco County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
